item.title: How do you perceive the future of Blockchain technology in economics and finance?
item.description:
How do you perceive the future of Blockchain technology in economics and finance?

When I was about 6 years old, my Great Grandmother had a party at her house. Everyone was there, friends, family, and many more. Somehow my aunt ended up in charge of feeding me. I asked for dinner, because the counters were too high and I was famished, and she loudly said, "You are a little glutton!

item.title: NAV Coin Attains Dedicated TOR Nodes
item.description:
NAV Coin Attains Dedicated TOR Nodes

Nav Coin has announced its users now have access to dedicated TOR Nodes that extend the capabilities of its anonymous network. The cryptocurrency who pride themselves on the anonymity of their network has built an active community of users. A user and member of bitcointalk.org known as BitcoinFX created the TOR service.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 08/26/2016 - More Bearish Signals? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 08/26/2016 - More Bearish Signals? - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be due for more losses once it breaks below the double top neckline around $560. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price could be due for more losses once it breaks below the double top neckline around $560. Technical Indicators Signals Bitcoin price recently broke below a short-term uptrend formation, signaling that a selloff was in order.

item.title: OpenBazaar Ecosystem: Virus Media
item.description:
OpenBazaar Ecosystem: Virus Media

In these posts we take a look at some unique members of the OpenBazaar ecosystem. Today we interview a vendor - Virus Media - selling various items, among them handmade crocheted items. You can find Virus Media on OpenBazaar at @virusmedia, and on Duosearch here. Tell us a bit about yourself?

item.title: Blockchain Voting: Russian government will use the ledger | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Blockchain Voting: Russian government will use the ledger | HolyTransaction

Today Moscow government revealed its plan to study the blockchain voting system. According to Gazeta.ru, deputy Andrey Belozerov explained that the Department of Information Technologies (DIT) of Moscow is studying how to apply the distributed ledger to various use cases, including blockchain voting to avoid frauds.

item.title: Trading Binary Options with Bitcoins
item.description:
Trading Binary Options with Bitcoins

The introduction of Bitcoins into the world of digital payments has made some incredible changes to the trading platform. The future of bitcoins is bright and sunny, which is very promising for traders who are using them.

item.title: Poll: Should businesses buy Bitcoin? - TechRepublic
item.description:
Poll: Should businesses buy Bitcoin? - TechRepublic

From futuristic startups to crazy ransomware Bitcoin and the blockchain are here to stay. Should business buy and trade Bitcoin? Take our poll and share your opinion about virtual currency.

item.title: Legal ID for All: Can Bitcoin's Blockchain Rise to the Challenge?
item.description:
Legal ID for All: Can Bitcoin's Blockchain Rise to the Challenge?

The United Nations aims to make it possible for all people to have a legal identity, including birth registration. This is one of the targets under the overarching goal of eradicating extreme poverty for all people everywhere by the year 2030. But providing an ID for everyone is a tremendous challenge.

item.title: Majority of Global Exchanges Now Testing Distributed Ledger Tech - CoinDesk
item.description:
Majority of Global Exchanges Now Testing Distributed Ledger Tech - CoinDesk

A global trade organization for financial exchanges released a new report today on distributed ledgers, highlighting concerns industry incumbents have regarding the technology. Twenty-four firms, constituting exchanges, central securities depositories and central counterparties, collectively dubbed "financial market infrastructures", or FMIs, took part in the survey, published by the World Federation of Exchanges (WFE).
